messages.content:
Hello! I'm your AI booking assistant. I can help you schedule appointments for various services including:

• **Consultation** (30-60 minutes) - Professional advice and planning
• **Therapy Session** (60 minutes) - Mental health and counseling support
• **Workshop** (90-120 minutes) - Skill development and training
• **Meeting** (30-60 minutes) - Business discussions and team collaboration
• **Business Consultation** (45-90 minutes) - Strategic planning and analysis
• **Creative Session** (60-90 minutes) - Design and brainstorming

**How can I help you today?** You can simply tell me what you need, like:
• "I need a consultation tomorrow at 10 AM"
• "Book a therapy session for next Monday"
• "Schedule a workshop for next week"
